ygData.subject: Re: Boneblade and beware in Ak'anon
ygData.msgSnippet: The bonebladed claymore is in Befallen the mighty paladin told me. Oh one thing to note all beware entering ak anon. I used to hunt there regulary and bewaring
ygData.messageBody:
The bonebladed claymore is in Befallen the mighty paladin told me. Oh one
thing to note all beware entering ak'anon. I used to hunt there regulary and
bewaring the mino hero I had myself bound to Ak'anon. The other day I was
killed and reappeared at my normal spot near entrance to my surpirse I was
swiftly killed by a clockwork merchant who proclaimed me a heathen. Turns out
my choosen diety doesnt work well with him, to make a long story short, due
to load times, he killed me three times in a row before I could even have
time to move out of zone, losing over 4 hours worth of work, needless to say
dropping back down to 11th lvl didn't sit well with me. I thought I would
pass along info being that merchant is right by zone, at least on my server
(Terrew Marr)

Sha'kel
(Almost 12 lvl again paladin)
